//Application name Mind Yourself //Nav Bar Content Home How To Use Features About Us //Featurespage Content Music Diary Quotes Sleep Prototype Features //Quotespage Content “When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.”—Norman Vincent Peale “Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.” ―W. P. Kinsella “Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.” — Tony Robbins “Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.” —Augustine Og Mandino “Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships.” — Michael Jordan “Opportunities dont happen, you create them.” — Chris Grosser “Set your goals high, and don’t stop till you get there.” —Bo Jackson “If you cant yet do great things, do small things in a great way.” ―Napoleon Hill “The greater the difficulty, the more the glory in surmounting it.” ―Epicurus “If you don’t risk anything, you risk even more.” —Erica Jong “Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.” — Henry Ford //Aboutus Content Our Mission Mind Yourself is a mental health application with various features designed to be a daily use application to improve the mental wellbeing and health of the Users. We Promise You Karam Qayum. A Final Year student studying Software Engineering. Contact our Team at 07000000000, or email MindYourself@gmail.com. Mind Yourself allows you to express yourself without feeling like you are being evaluated. Come use the app in your own time to your own needs and watch that low mood dissapear :)
//Homepage Content Play Games Write It Down Visit NHS Website Recharge Your Battery //Homepage Links Click here to visit the website Click here to visit the website Click here to visit the website Click here to visit the website //Sleep feature Content 6 hours or less sleep is not healthy and it is recommended that you get between 7-9 hours rest each night. YOU CAN DO THIS. Sleeping between 7 to 9 hours each night is recommended. AMAZING KEEP IT UP. Sleeping more than 10 hours a night can be a sign to underlying issues and can increase risk of health issues. PLEASE AVOID THIS, SET ALARMS //Sleep features Links More Details //diary content Enter Entry Name Enter Entry Date Enter Entry Description Add Entry Read All Entries //music content Music is known to positively impact your Mood SO ENJOY //howtouse Context How to Use the App Mind Yourself aims to be simple to use, the homepage includes tips for helping your mental health with links to important websites. Features will be described below: The Quotes Feature In need of motivation, simply open the quotes page press the button and you will see the quote for you. You can press it as many times as you want and get a wide range of quotes. The Music Feature Ensure you have music files saved to your device. Press the select song button and select the song and you will be able to play, pause and stop whilst watching the calming animation. The Diary Feature You will be able to add entries with a title, date and description and write down your feelings and thoughts. You can view all your entries and update/delete them when you need to. Can also use this as a TO DO list. Mind Yourself aims to be the go to, daily use app to benefit users mental health. These are just the protoype features in their base forms each will be developed upon, and various other features will be developed The Future In this feature you can input your hours of sleep for the past 7 days, do this by passing 7 numbers seperated by , (commas) and press plot. It will show your sleep inputs and calculate your average. You will be informed whether you should sleep more or less. Can also visit the Link for important information regarding sleep, The Sleep Feature
